SEARCH
Package com.serezk4.io.file

Interface FileWorker

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, IOWorker<String>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BufferedFileWorker
public interface FileWorker extends IOWorker<String>
Interface for reading and writing data to and from a file.

Extends the IOWorker interface to provide file-specific functionality, including reading all content from a file.

Since:
1.0
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • readAll

      default String readAll()
      Reads all data from the file.

      Continuously reads from the file until no more data is available, appending each line to a StringBuilder.

      Returns:
      a string containing all the data from the file
